column5: Enjoy peaceful & clean neighborhood. Spacious & open house plan with connected kitchen, DR, LR. New & clean furniture. New bedroom and bathroom supplies. Fully equipped kitchen.   Exemplary elementary school within 2 blocks in highly rated Richardson ISD. A very clean and pleasant walking trail within 1/2 block. 100's of fast-food and famous restaurants. 2 major shopping malls. Easy access to major highways and toll roads. Several play areas and golf courses.
